bibl.title: SB I 993 not from the Reign of Caracalla.
bibl.note: I.G.R. I, 1136 = S.B. I, 993 = I. Akôris 13. Reads in lines 3-6: "[M]a[r/k]ou Aur[el]iou [Kommodou] / Antoninou Sebastou / Eusebous". The inscription has to be dated to November 25, A.D. 184.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, SB I 993 not from the Reign of Caracalla.
I.G.R. I, 1136 = S.B. I, 993 = I. Akôris 13. Reads in lines 3-6: "[M]a[r/k]ou Aur[el]iou [Kommodou] / Antoninou Sebastou / Eusebous". The inscription has to be dated to November 25, A.D. 184.
